Calculates summary statistics on a set of scaffolds

Calculates summary statistics on a set of scaffolds. Can be used on any object loaded using mmload.

mmstats(data, ncov)

Arguments

data

The dataframe containing the bin data (e.g. dA).
ncov

The number of coverage datasets (default = 2).
data_compare

The dataframe containing the all data (e.g. d).

Value

An overview of key statistics of the scaffolds.

Examples


data(rocco)
mmstats(data = d, ncov = 4)
#>                    General Stats
#> n.scaffolds             97285.00
#> GC.mean                    52.20
#> N50                      5291.00
#> Length.total        331908376.00
#> Length.max            1446979.00
#> Length.mean              3411.70
#> Coverage.C13.11.14          2.62
#> Coverage.C13.11.25         16.06
#> Coverage.C13.12.03          2.91
#> Coverage.C14.01.09         11.58
#> Ess.total                7138.00
#> Ess.unique                109.00
